original_story: [shocked] Did you hear? Last Week Tonight is officially cancelled! John Oliver's satirical brilliance, which tackled everything from net neutrality to corruption, is ending after an incredible 10 seasons. Since its debut in 2014, the show has amassed over 30 Emmy nominations, winning 11. Fans loved Oliver's deep dives into social issues, often making complex topics accessible. But now, HBO is shifting gears, leaving viewers wondering â€“ what will fill that late-night void? Will we ever see Oliver tackle those burning issues again? The suspense is real!
